reviews.review: Very fun game, brilliant with friends!

I have watched this game played on Twitch a million times but never felt like I would be very good or enjoy it. Well I was wrong. It is so much fun to play and such an adrenaline rush. Its terrifying with all the sounds and killers sneaking up on you and oh so satisfying to hack up a toxic survivor. Definitely recommend for people who like horror games with a twist.
fine gameplay, bad hitboxes and graphics

Ist chillig mit Freunden zu spielen. Online bockt es teils aber man spielt halt oft gegen tryhard Killer oder man hat Teammates, bei denen man meinen könnte, dasss sie das Spiel mit Lenkrad spielen.

キラーでプレイする場合、高速で屈伸するサバイバーを見ることになるため、煽られるのが好きな方にオススメのゲームなので購入を推奨します。また課金して遊べるキラーを増やしてもBPが枯渇し楽しく遊べるようになるのは時間がかかるので、
時間に大きく余裕がある方にオススメです。
サバイバーでプレイする場合、キラー人口が少ないためマッチングが非常に長く、20分待ってもマッチングしないこともあります。せっかく長時間待ってマッチングしても、ポイント稼ぎの放置キラーにあたることも多く安全な廃墟のお散歩が楽しめます。

ユーザーレビュー：非常に好評
をみて万が一購入してしまう方がいるかもしれないのでレビューします
Muito bom para jogar com os amigos.

이 게임은 돈값을 못하는게임 
들이는 시간에비해 게임내 자본은 하나도 안늘어나고 
개발자들이 자신들게임을 안해서 
이해도가 부족하고 완성도가 부족하고 결국 재미가 부족함 

생존자는 캠핑 터널링 당하면 아무것도 못하고 매달려만있다 끝나 불만족이고
살인마는 생존자가 실수안하면 하나도 못잡는 이상한 밸런스때매 불만족

비매너 유저들에대한 제재가 1도없어서 재미로 하는 비매너에 대해 
안하는걸 이상하게 생각하는 유저들층이 많을정도

이게임 한국1위 스트리머 살인마협회장도 최근에는 이게임 시간이 급격히 줄어들었으며 안하는날도 늘고있고
롤하는 랭킹권 스트리머중 롤이 질린다는 사람이 없는걸보면 이게임이 얼마나 깊이가 부족한지 반증함

다시 말하지만 이게임은 개발진이 게임에대한 애정과 완성도에 대한 욕구가 부족한게임이라
패치될때마다 가끔 돌아와서 하는데도 바뀐게없고 이해도가없어 
오히려 게임을 루즈하게 만드는 패치를 굉장히 많이하기때문에 시간을 주면 줄수록 실망감이 커짐

만약 유튜브 영상이나 스트리밍으로 구매를 고민하고있다면 
그냥 그돈으로 그 스트리머에게 원하는 플레이를 후원해서 대리만족을 하는게 훨씬 가성비가 좋으니
그 경우는 절대 구매하지 않았으면함 

당신의 돈이 아껴지길바라는 플레이어가 남김
The only thing I dislike about the game is that none of my xbox purchases are transferred onto the this version cause than I have to rebuy everything. But overall I love the game.

Отличная игра, советую поиграть
Вешаюсь каждый день🐗

Normally I would recommend this game for people as it has managed to create its own niche as it is the only asymmetrical horror game that has an active player base. However, the state of the game has been on a long decline because of the fact that they no competition in the market. The developers are to blame for this as they have continuously released broken and buggy content while ignoring player feedback. The best example of this is the issue of colour-blind accessibility which took the developers four years to add into the game only after an article was written about one of the devs snide comments to people requesting it. 4 YEARS.

The last four DLCs for this game have also had buggy and broken messes that existed for far too long. The Blight from the “Descent Beyond” chapter is still in rough shape as his mechanics don’t work 100% of the time. Players, myself included, complained about the height of his camera as it didn’t match his player model. This was fixed nine months after release while he still slides off a lot of objects. “A Binding of Kin” was extremely buggy in the PTB and none of these bugs were fixed with the live launch of the game. The game was unstable, laggy, and the Twins were prone to frequent camera issues and getting stuck in places. “All-Kill” was a completely forgettable chapter that introduced the Trickster who is very weak killer and again, the developers did not listen to feedback from the PTB. The “All-Kill” chapter is most remembered for the previously mentioned Blight POV fix and Wraith buff (which had been requested for years). The current chapter follows the long line of Behaviour releasing a broken and buggy mess as the new map has been disabled for crashing consoles with consoles also being extremely laggy in games. Community feedback was ignored once again from the PTB with no real changes being made to concerns.

Another gripe that I have with this game is the grind. The in-game currency has become completely inflated over the years as it was originally made for only about 26 perks for each side. They added tiers to the perks to extend the grind of the game and therefore made it so there are technically 78 perks to unlock to get everything. The issue today is that there are 95 survivor perks and 84 for killers with the same tier system meaning you need to unlock 285 and 252 perks respectively. To put that into perspective I have over 700 hours in the game with only one survivor with all perks and one killer. 
Tl;dr Devs bad, grind bad. Do not recommend to newer players
I have been a long time fan and started on xbox, it sucks I have to start over but I still have a blast playing.

Fun game to play with friends

O jogo é muito bom, extremamente viciantes se jogado com amigos, porém tem pontos bons e ruim claro.

Pros:
-O jogo conta com sistema de progressão baseado em lvls tanto de personagens quanto de conta, então tira  um pouco o efeito de ta fazendo a mesma coisa.
-Pode-se fazer builds diferentes, pegar perks de outros personagens e colocar onde você quiser, o ceu é o limite
-Pra jogar com os amigos é uma experiencia muito descente, recomendo comprar junto com outra pessoa e esperar promo.
-O jogo te recompensa a jogar unido, o sistema de pontuação in game te recompensa por ações altruístas, isso faz com q situações de 1v9 sejam descorajadas.

Contras:
-A comunidade é muito toxica (e olha que sou jogar de lol), sempre vai ter pelo menos um cara no final da partida que fala espanhol te chamando de macaco.
-O matchmaking é zoado, você pode cair com galera que joga muito mal ou muito bem, ainda mais se você tiver jogando com um amigo com um raking mais alto que o seu.
-O caminho do assassino é pouco apreciado pelos iniciantes, até por que quando se joga de assassino você joga sozinho
-Alguns personagens só podem ser obtidos através de cash (dinheiro mesmo vei) e isso limita alguns perks de serem adquiridos, mais uma vez espere a promo pra comprar esse conteúdo, de resto da pra adquirir quase tudo dentro do jogo grindando.

Em resumo o jogo é divertido pra se jogar sozinho mas muito divertido com amigos, ignore certas toxidades das pessoas e reportem elas que vai da tudo certo, o assassino é meio difícil de jogar mas com o tempo você pega o jeito. Jogar de assassino ajuda você a jogar de sobrevivente e vice-versa, timing é muito importante nesse jogo e a situação pode ta muito boa e do nada piorar terrivelmente valeu pena pelo preço (comprei por 18 conto) que paguei (fiz uns 5 amigos meus comprarem também e isso me fez jogar mais)

stinkyass

キラー専門でやっています。1年前くらいはランク1をキープしてました。
どう考えてもキラー側が不利。生存者側のパークが強いし、不滅などキラーはナーフが多い。最近決死の一撃が弱体化したが、怪我の功名など、生存者側のパークは強化があからさまに多い気がする。また、使えるパーク、使えないパークがはっきりしているので使うパークが偏りやすい。アップデートで使用率の低いパークは強化を入れてほしい。
ボイスチャットで鍵を持っていたらほぼほぼ勝てない。1対4なのだから、キラーが少し強いくらいが丁度いいと思う。出口で生存者に煽られるし、ストレスが溜まる。鍵はいつになったら変更が入るのか。ボイスチャットでキラーの居場所伝え放題、連携取り放題。血族なんていうパークは要らない。ボイスチャットが悪というわけではないが、どう考えてもキラー不利。ランク上位はボイスチャットが多い気がする。
久しぶりに開いたらUIが変わっていて正直見にくい。なぜ生存者を縦に並べたのか。前の配置のままが良かった。
ハントレスを久しぶりに使用したら、疲労斧のアドオンが削除されてて驚き。どこまで運営はキラーが嫌いなのか、、、。
散々昔から言われているマッチングのランク差は結局治った気がしない(そもそもキラーの人口が少ないからだろうか、、、？)
色々書いてみたが、結論はストレスが溜まりまくるのでお勧めできない(特にキラー)。数年前始めたときは楽しかったが、極めれば極めるほど不満が大きくなる。運営はキラー嫌いだからね、これからキラーが良い方向に改善するとは思えないと感じ、1年前から徐々にやらなくなりました。
